channel.title: SOMEONE HELP ME PLEASE need help making rsps on mac
channel.description: THERE IS NO SOURCE OR CLIENTS FOR MAC, THEY ARE ALL .BAT SOMEONE HELP :( :confused:

item.title: SOMEONE HELP ME PLEASE need help making rsps on mac
item.dc:creator: @FoHammer FoHammer
item.description:
@FoHammer wrote:

lolkiddo1001:

THERE IS NO SOURCE OR CLIENTS FOR MAC, THEY ARE ALL .BAT SOMEONE HELP

a) Wrong section
b) Most RSPS’s have 2 bats, one that runs the source and starts the game engine, and the 2nd a compiler, so compile (save) the files you edit and make them take effect, unless you’re using a IDE, a IDE like Eclipse will compile and automatically save the files as you make changes and save them
c) A source is a source, the way it’s ran is the key, lookup how to create a RSPS on mac.

Here is one resource I will provide you with, these two links and this comment should help you and get you on the right track to begin your programming experiences. I would also advise to start learning Java, a RSPS is normally based and written in Java.

Guide how to make a RSPS on mac:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=442856.0

Begin learning Java Here:

Java Beginners Tutorial

Core Java Tutorial | Learn By Example Core Java | Cheat Sheet for Core Java

This Java tutorial is basically for Beginners who wants to learn java from basics. Here you learn everything from installing JDK to Variable to operator to Access modifier.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
